channel.title: A few things
channel.description: So recently I have seen people getting their name's changed.. What do I do? I asked Niall for a name change to either Aaron_ or `Aaron, what happens? He tells me no that name changes aren't allowed, well wth happened to that, after i replied to the message I see someone else has the name `Aaron now after he just told me that they aren't allow? That is a crock of shit in my opinion, just because one staff member say's no, the other ones do it? If your gonna say it's not allowed, make sure all the staff knows that, otherwise people will continue to ask.

item.title: A few things
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:7, topic:297615”]Aren’t allowed?

The hunt = 'Alec?

Bug them on the irc for a few hours.[/quote]
That method is also the signal for “I’m a fucking idiot, ban me now or I’ll give you a reason later.”

Read full topic

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Aren’t allowed?

The hunt = 'Alec?

Bug them on the irc for a few hours.

Read full topic

item.title: A few things
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

There’s usually exceptions, quite a few things factor into them doing it, though.

Read full topic

item.title: A few things
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

m.dog311:

They are only done when it is to change capitalization, or something small like that. But full out name changes aren’t allowed.

Then why did people get the full out name change? Such as Lewk, someone that just got his name changed to 'Aaron, and a few other people…

Read full topic

item.title: A few things
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

Lin:

Since when is it not aloud?

Niall said it wasn’t, he said “Sorry, name changes aren’t allowed.”

But some kid gets the name `Aaron when i requested it over a week ago, and Niall just now pm’s me today about it.

Read full topic
